title: Walt Disney Animation Studios Short Films Collection

sources.title: Walt Disney: The Enchanter
sources.description:
Discover the magic behind the mouse! âœ¨ Dive into the untold story of Walt Disney â€“ the visionary who transformed animation and built an entertainment empire. From his early career and sketchpad struggles to Hollywood triumphs, this documentary explores:

â€¢ Walt Disney's journey from Missouri farm life to founding a global entertainment empire
â€¢ The pivotal loss of Oswald the Rabbit that reshaped Disney's creative and business approach
â€¢ Cinema's first animated feature: Snow White - Production challenges
â€¢ The intense studio environment driving revolutionary animation techniques
â€¢ Firsthand accounts of studio operations & Exploitative Labor Practices
â€¢ Artistic controversies surrounding psychological depth in Disney's storytelling
â€¢ Lasting cultural legacy beyond animation in theme parks and merchandising

0:00:00 - Episode 1
0:12:02 - Alice in Cartoonland https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2gsu7VGzgdZb4lqkARtzu5kFxpTHZE6v
0:33:07 - Steamboat Willie full animation: https://youtu.be/AtTTmX9Y-Ic
0:45:00 - Oswald the Rabbit era and betrayal by Charles Mintz
1:15:00 - Mickey's cultural impact during the Great Depression
1:45:00 - Labor practices and 1941 animators' strike
1:51:08 - Episode 2
2:10:00 - Television breakthrough: ABC deal and financing Disneyland
2:35:00 - Construction chaos: Last-minute challenges before opening
2:55:00 - Disneyland's rocky premiere day (technical failures, heatwave)
3:10:00 - Theme park innovations and cultural impact (1955-1960s)
3:25:00 - Walt's final projects: World's Fair exhibits and EPCOT vision
3:35:00 - Legacy: Death (1966) and enduring influence on entertainment

ðŸ‘‰ Share your favorite Disney memory in the comments! What classic character inspired you most?

metadata.Plot: A series of superb animated short films, created by the brilliant minds at Disney Animated Studios, and narrated by the executive staff.
metadata.Director: Roger Allers, Mark Henn, Lauren MacMullan
metadata.Writer: Roger Allers (story adaptation by), Ed Gombert (story development), Kevin Harkey (story development), Nancy Kruse (story), Lauren MacMullan (story), Burny Mattinson (story/additional story), Marc Smith (story by)
metadata.Actors: Paul Briggs, Alan Dale, Bill Farmer, Jack Goldenberg
